This website.description: Responsive, and taking full advantage of CSS3 feautures to minimize the use of lower-performance JS code.

PAPER.description: A desktop application to automate a repetitive process, written to reduce my team's workload during my time in Security Support. Streamlined GUI with just three buttons.

SICP.description: In order to deepen my understanding of functional programming, I am working my way through all exercises from the legendary Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs.

Roman Janiczek.description: A tribute page to my late grandfather. Intentionally minimalistic, yet still designed with responsiveness in mind.
